original_text: The ground under the prison suddenly shook strongly. Immediately, all the prison doors opened. The chains that held the people in the prison all fell off.
korean_text: 이에 갑자기 큰 지진이 나서 옥터가 움직이고 문이 곧 다 열리며 모든 사람의 매인 것이 다 벗어진지라

sentences.original_text: The ground under the prison suddenly shook strongly
sentences.korean_translation: 감옥 아래 땅이 갑자기 강하게 흔들렸다

sentences.original_text: Immediately, all the prison doors opened
The chains that held the people in the prison all fell off
sentences.korean_translation: 감옥에 있던 사람들을 묶고 있던 쇠사슬이 모두 풀려났다
